text: And if it's gratuitous and vapid? who cares lol it's probably hot
"Sex scenes are unnecessary" is just another way of saying the only way a story can move forward is through constant, unbroken action. It's just not true.

This is one way among many but it's a very good way. You get into how a character feels about their body, their capacity for love and intimacy and revulsion and hate, the methods they have devised to cope with who they are to other people.

"All sex scenes are unnecessary" discourse always makes me laugh because a good sex scene is one of the best ways to strip a character down to their core and show the unseen parts of themselves and the relationships they form. So to speak.
